kw.name: Get Current Date
kw.doc: Returns current local or UTC time with an optional increment.

kw.name: Convert Date
kw.doc: Converts between supported `date formats`.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: Register Keyword To Run On Failure
kw.msg: Tirar Screenshot will be run on failure.
kw.doc: Sets the keyword to execute, when a SeleniumLibrary keyword fails.

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.doc: Sets the implicit wait value used by Selenium.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.
